name: Bogs Classic Casual Tall Lace Leather Boots - Women's
categories: Classic Casual Tall Lace Leather Boots
description:
Stylish, sustainably minded, sub-zero protection. Bogs has worked a little magic with the Classic Casual Tall boots, using recycled materials in nearly every part of construction. And, where there was no recycled option, Bogs looked to innovative materials, from LWG certified leather, to an algae-based foam. These boots will warm your feet and your heart.100% waterproof construction.Recycled rubber, laces, jersey and heel webbing.Neo-Tech™ insulation – Bogs comfort rates these boots down to -15°C.DuraFresh™ natural odour control.Leather used comes from a gold rated tannery. The Leather Working Group judges and classifies tanneries based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.Rebound cushioning under the heel provides all-day comfort and support.Dual-density Bloom™ Algae foam footbed – Bloom foam has a reduced carbon footprint compared to standard foams.Grippy rubber outsole.

        Sustainability









                      Leather Working Group leather
